snippet.title: Lakeview Cabin Collection Trailer
snippet.description:
lakeviewcabingame.com    

Four sexy companions meet at a lakeview cabin to set up a summer camp.  Unfortunately for them, no one told them they are in a slasher movie franchise.  Even more unfortunate, they are entirely at your command.

Lakeview Cabin Collection debuts on Humble Store for PC and Mac with it's first episode,Lakeview Cabin III.  Lakeview Cabin Collection is an exploration of the cliches and thrills of cult horror movies through sandbox gameplay.  You initially find yourself at the titular Lakeview Cabin, with enough toys and tools to make your weekend a blast.  But when eldritch horrors crawl out from the lake, you'll need to blast, shoot, chop and burn your way to survive.  

Lakeview Cabin Collection celebrates the aesthetics and atmosphere of Evil Dead, Friday the 13th and The Hills Have Eyes.  Use a smattering of items at your disposal to shape your horror movie experience.  Place traps by laying rakes and gasoline along the camp.  Go berzerk and kick your friends into a woodchipper from a zipline.  Or take off your clothes, have a few brews and snuggle up with your companions on one of the camp's comfy cots.  Whatever you do, you are likely to not survive the horrors that tend to creep up around the Lakeview Cabin.

As seen on Pewdiepie, jacksepticeye and Steam Greenlight.

For video marketing commissions and questions, you can reach James Id at http://jamesid.com/contact
